titleStmt.title: The doctors medicines and counsel which he gave to a maiden or, A cloak for a gross widdow
Doctors medicines and counsel which he gave to a maiden.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Clark at the Harp and Bible in West-smith-field,

notesStmt.note: Imprint place and and imprint date from Wing.
Verse - "Draw near young lasses that in the street passes".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
